resources.string: If you are new to the Inspector app, you should read through the instructions. To access them, go to the top right menu and select Instructions.

Hold left button for three seconds, then a list of nearby Sensordrones will appear. Select the Sensordrone you would like to connect to. The LEDs on the drone will blink and the concentration will now be displayed on the LCD portion of the app.

If an alarm is going off and you would like to mute the device, press the left button. An arrow will appear above the mute label on the app\'s simulated LCD screen. To unmute, just press the left button again.

The right button will hold the maximum value that is measured. After it is pressed, an arrow appears above the max label and the program will only show the highest recorded concentration while in the MAX mode. To return to real time (normal) mode, simply press the right button again.

There may be a situation where you want to zero out the device, such as if it is always reading above 0 PPM and you believe that there is no CO present. To do this you will reset the baseline. Press and hold both buttons for 5 seconds. You will then see a screen that says CAL. Press the right button to start calculating the new baseline. Press the left button to cancel. After 30 seconds, the device should be zeroed. If you want to cancel while it is counting down, press the left button. If you want to undo the baseline, select Reset Baseline in the top right menu.
To disconnect, hold the left button for three seconds.

There may be a situation where you want to zero out the device, such as if it is always reading above 0 PPM and you believe that there is no CO present. To do this you will reset the baseline. Go to the main menu and select Calibrate. You will then see a screen that says CAL. Press the right button to start calculating the new baseline. Press the left button to cancel. After 30 seconds, the device should be zeroed. If you want to cancel while it is counting down, press the left button. If you want to undo the baseline, select Reset Baseline in the top right menu.
